original_text: So I went back to Perath. I dug out the belt from the place where I had hidden it. But it had become spoiled. I could not use it any more.
korean_text: 내가 유브라데로 가서 그 감추었던 곳을 파고 띠를 가져오니 띠가 썩어서 쓸 수 없게 되었더라

sentences.original_text: So I went back to Perath
from the place where I had hidden it
I could not use it any more
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 더 이상 그것을 사용할 수 없었습니다
